text: Bhutan competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Bhutan entered two swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Kinley Lhendup |align=left|50 m butterfly |34.21 |93 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m individual medley |3:00.53 |51 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Sangay Tenzin |align=left|50 m freestyle |29.49 |125 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |1:07.28 |120 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Bhutan at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Bhutan at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
